name: BalloOne
description:
Can you complete ONE level, jumping trough ONE kilometer, using only ONE button?

If you like unique challenges, BalloOne is the game for you.

Features
  • Simple and beautiful graphics.
  • Pleasant songs.
  • Challenging.
  • Easy to play: Use only SPACE BAR to play

This game was developed by Dias Games company. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Dias-Games-2377451722474645/
